C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: WebKit, IndentWidth: 8, AlignTrailingComments: true, NamespaceIndentation: All,BreakBeforeBraces: Custom,BraceWrapping: { AfterUnion: true,AfterEnum: true,AfterStruct: true,AfterClass: true,AfterFunction: true,AfterNamespace: true,AfterExternBlock: true,AfterControlStatement: false,BeforeCatch: false,BeforeElse: false } }
